name: SPACE PIZZA (Dovahkev)
description:
Your Boss Fabio said that this city aint got no pizza. Some Hotshot "Mayor" prefers garlic bread and has brainwashed the people.

Go and remind em how good Fabio's Pizza tastes!

W A S D - Control Pitch and Yaw

SPACEBAR - Shoots Pizzaaaaaaaaaaa

SHIFT - GO FAST

I & O - Control Roll

Heres a little something I wrote for this game ...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zucgy5xxoycipol/JIGD.txt...
